description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 1/30/2007

Nick and Brooke discuss the reasons behind their failed marriage. Nick wonders how Brooke got over him so quickly. Rick tells Phoebe he’s bothered that Brooke and Ridge are marrying again, but Phoebe tries to defend Brooke and Ridge’s decision to reunite. After some playful flirtation, Rick and Phoebe realize they are not related to each other. Eric and Pam get to know each other while playing a word game. Eric convinces Pam to stay for Brooke and Ridge’s engagement party. Pam has a fantasy about Eric kissing her.
